Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text:
Went in with a 8 people group because it was the first good looking place that had room for us.
IT WAS THE BEST DECISION EVER! …

Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text: Very nice and spacious restaurant. My boyfriend and I go there once in a while to have a nice dinner and enjoy the local beer. The staff is friendly and welcoming, the chef cooks wonders, the portions are good and they have a decent selection of wines. I definitely recommend this place for a pleasant time and good quality food!!

Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text: Lovely fresh food with right portions. And normal prices, the ambiance is warm with good music. Staff is friendly.

Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text: We discovered this place passing by, and we truly enjoyed it. Really tasty food with good portions. The lasagne leaves you pretty full. Recommended 100%.

Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text:
Food was good.
Not exceptional but good.
Service, also good. …

Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text: We had a couple of beers and meatballs which were amazing!! It was a little bit cold for my taste. Big tables and also they have some couches. It would have been great if they had a real fireplace. Good place to eat and grab a few drinks. I will return here if I have the opportunity.

Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text: A bit on the expensive side but great service and delicious food.

Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text:
Really kind and nice staff! Very tasty cheeseburgers and the local beer was great.
All in all a very good end to a great evening.

Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text: Very nice food and service

Review Text:

Name: De Nieuwe Pilserij
Review Text: Great restaurant, great food and the staff are all friendly. Highly recommended. Ambience is unbeatable.

Review Text: Waiting 40 minutes for food so wife had to leave before we were served.  Waitress was extremely rude and shouted at me in front of all other customers. Very awkward.
